name: PKRecurringPaymentSummaryItem
desc: An object that defines a summary item for a payment that occurs repeatedly at a specified interval, such as a subscription.

items.name: var startDate: Date?
items.desc: The date of the first payment.

items.name: var endDate: Date?
items.desc: The date of the final payment.

items.name: var intervalUnit: NSCalendar.Unit
items.desc: The amount of time – in calendar units, such as day, month, or year – that represents a fraction of the total payment interval.

items.name: var intervalCount: Int
items.desc: The number of interval units that make up the total payment interval.
